THE LATEST CAR WASH IN TOWN

AUTOMATIC

Korsel has 2 automatic drive through coin operated car washers that you can use.

SELF SERVICE

Our car wash has 10 coin operated automatic self service booths, with four operating programs.

CLEANING

Clean your car interior with most modern vacuum cleanears available to you.

PERFUME

Enrich your car smell with up to five different perfume scents on our locations.
